trans-unit.source: Set up Windows 10 Mobile and Windows Phone management | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Set up Windows 10 Mobile and Windows Phone management | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Enable mobile device management (MDM) for Windows 10 Mobile or Windows Phone devices with Microsoft Intune.
trans-unit.target: Enable mobile device management (MDM) for Windows 10 Mobile or Windows Phone devices with Microsoft Intune.

trans-unit.source: Set up Windows Phone and Windows 10 Mobile management with Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Set up Windows Phone and Windows 10 Mobile management with Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: As an Intune administrator, you can enable enrollment and management for Windows 10 Mobile and Windows Phone devices in two ways:
trans-unit.target: As an Intune administrator, you can enable enrollment and management for Windows 10 Mobile and Windows Phone devices in two ways:

trans-unit.source: **[Automatic enrollment with Azure AD](#azure-active-directory-enrollment)** - Windows 10 and Window 10 Mobile users enroll their devices by adding a work or school account to the device
trans-unit.target: **[Automatic enrollment with Azure AD](#azure-active-directory-enrollment)** - Windows 10 and Window 10 Mobile users enroll their devices by adding a work or school account to the device

trans-unit.source: **[Company Portal enrollment](#company-portal-app-enrollment)** - Windows Phone 8.1 and later devices are enrolled by downloading and installing the Company Portal app, and then entering their work or school account credentials in the app.
trans-unit.target: **[Company Portal enrollment](#company-portal-app-enrollment)** - Windows Phone 8.1 and later devices are enrolled by downloading and installing the Company Portal app, and then entering their work or school account credentials in the app.

trans-unit.source: Company Portal app enrollment
trans-unit.target: Company Portal app enrollment

trans-unit.source: You can let users enroll their devices by installing and enrolling their devices with the Intune Company Portal app.
trans-unit.target: You can let users enroll their devices by installing and enrolling their devices with the Intune Company Portal app.

trans-unit.source: Creating a DNS CNAME helps users connect and enroll in Intune without entering a server name.
trans-unit.target: Creating a DNS CNAME helps users connect and enroll in Intune without entering a server name.

trans-unit.source: If you manage Windows Phone 8.0 devices or need to deploy the Company Portal to Windows Phone devices, you must also download and sign the Company Portal app.
trans-unit.target: If you manage Windows Phone 8.0 devices or need to deploy the Company Portal to Windows Phone devices, you must also download and sign the Company Portal app.

trans-unit.source: See [Set up Windows Phone 8.0 management](set-up-windows-phone-8.0-management-with-microsoft-intune.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Set up Windows Phone 8.0 management](set-up-windows-phone-8.0-management-with-microsoft-intune.md).

trans-unit.source: **Set up Intune**
trans-unit.target: **Set up Intune**

trans-unit.source: If you haven’t already, prepare for mobile device management by [setting the mobile device management authority](get-ready-to-enroll-devices-in-microsoft-intune.md#set-mobile-device-management-authority) as **Microsoft Intune** and setting up MDM.
trans-unit.target: If you haven’t already, prepare for mobile device management by [setting the mobile device management authority](get-ready-to-enroll-devices-in-microsoft-intune.md#set-mobile-device-management-authority) as **Microsoft Intune** and setting up MDM.

trans-unit.source: **Create CNAMEs** (optional)
trans-unit.target: **Create CNAMEs** (optional)

trans-unit.source: Create **CNAME** DNS resource records for your company’s domain.
trans-unit.target: Create **CNAME** DNS resource records for your company’s domain.

trans-unit.source: For example, if your company’s website is contoso.com, you would create a CNAME in DNS that redirects EnterpriseEnrollment.contoso.com to manage.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: For example, if your company’s website is contoso.com, you would create a CNAME in DNS that redirects EnterpriseEnrollment.contoso.com to manage.microsoft.com.

trans-unit.source: If there is more than one verified domain, create a CNAME record for each domain.
trans-unit.target: If there is more than one verified domain, create a CNAME record for each domain.

trans-unit.source: The CNAME resource records must contain the following information:
trans-unit.target: The CNAME resource records must contain the following information:

trans-unit.source: TYPE
trans-unit.target: TYPE

trans-unit.source: Host name
trans-unit.target: Host name

trans-unit.source: Points to
trans-unit.target: Points to

trans-unit.source: TTL
trans-unit.target: TTL

trans-unit.source: CNAME
trans-unit.target: CNAME

trans-unit.source: EnterpriseEnrollment.company_domain.com
trans-unit.target: EnterpriseEnrollment.company_domain.com

trans-unit.source: EnterpriseEnrollment-s.manage.microsoft.com
trans-unit.target: EnterpriseEnrollment-s.manage.microsoft.com

trans-unit.source: 1 Hour
trans-unit.target: 1 Hour

trans-unit.source: CNAME
trans-unit.target: CNAME

trans-unit.source: EnterpriseRegistration.company_domain.com
trans-unit.target: EnterpriseRegistration.company_domain.com

trans-unit.source: EnterpriseRegistration.windows.net
trans-unit.target: EnterpriseRegistration.windows.net

trans-unit.source: 1 Hour
trans-unit.target: 1 Hour

trans-unit.source: DNS record changes might take up to 72 hours to propagate.
trans-unit.target: DNS record changes might take up to 72 hours to propagate.

trans-unit.source: You cannot verify the DNS change in Intune until the DNS record propagates.
trans-unit.target: You cannot verify the DNS change in Intune until the DNS record propagates.

trans-unit.source: `EnterpriseEnrollment-s.manage.microsoft.com` – Supports a redirect to the Intune service with domain recognition from the email’s domain name
trans-unit.target: `EnterpriseEnrollment-s.manage.microsoft.com` – Supports a redirect to the Intune service with domain recognition from the email’s domain name

trans-unit.source: `EnterpriseRegistration.windows.net` – Supports Windows 8.1 and Windows 10 Mobile devices that will register with Azure Active Directory using their work or school account
trans-unit.target: `EnterpriseRegistration.windows.net` – Supports Windows 8.1 and Windows 10 Mobile devices that will register with Azure Active Directory using their work or school account

trans-unit.source: If your company uses multiple domains for user credentials, create CNAME records for each domain.
trans-unit.target: If your company uses multiple domains for user credentials, create CNAME records for each domain.

trans-unit.source: For example, if your company’s website is contoso.com, you would create a CNAME in DNS that redirects EnterpriseEnrollment.contoso.com to EnterpriseEnrollment-s.manage.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: For example, if your company’s website is contoso.com, you would create a CNAME in DNS that redirects EnterpriseEnrollment.contoso.com to EnterpriseEnrollment-s.manage.microsoft.com.

trans-unit.source: DNS record changes might take up to 72 hours to propagate.
trans-unit.target: DNS record changes might take up to 72 hours to propagate.

trans-unit.source: You cannot verify the DNS change in Intune until the DNS record propagates.
trans-unit.target: You cannot verify the DNS change in Intune until the DNS record propagates.

trans-unit.source: **Verify CNAME**
trans-unit.target: **Verify CNAME**

trans-unit.source: In the [Intune administration console](http://manage.microsoft.com), click **Administration** > **Mobile Device Management** > **Windows Phone**.
trans-unit.target: In the [Intune administration console](http://manage.microsoft.com), click **Administration** > **Mobile Device Management** > **Windows Phone**.

trans-unit.source: Type the URL of the verified domain of the company website in the **Specify a verified domain name** box and then click **Test Auto-Detection**.
trans-unit.target: Type the URL of the verified domain of the company website in the **Specify a verified domain name** box and then click **Test Auto-Detection**.

trans-unit.source: Set up mobile device management for Windows dialog box
trans-unit.target: Set up mobile device management for Windows dialog box

trans-unit.source: **Optional steps**
trans-unit.target: **Optional steps**

trans-unit.source: The **Add Sideloading keys** step is not needed for Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: The **Add Sideloading keys** step is not needed for Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: The **Upload Code-Signing Certificate** step is only needed if you will distribute line-of-business (LOB) apps to devices not available from the Windows Store.
trans-unit.target: The **Upload Code-Signing Certificate** step is only needed if you will distribute line-of-business (LOB) apps to devices not available from the Windows Store.

trans-unit.source: [Learn more](set-up-windows-phone-8.0-management-with-microsoft-intune.md)
trans-unit.target: [Learn more](set-up-windows-phone-8.0-management-with-microsoft-intune.md)

trans-unit.source: **Inform users**
trans-unit.target: **Inform users**

trans-unit.source: Your users will need to know how to enroll their devices and what to expect once they're brought into management.
trans-unit.target: Your users will need to know how to enroll their devices and what to expect once they're brought into management.

trans-unit.source: [What to tell your end users about using Microsoft Intune](what-to-tell-your-end-users-about-using-microsoft-intune.md)
trans-unit.target: [What to tell your end users about using Microsoft Intune](what-to-tell-your-end-users-about-using-microsoft-intune.md)

trans-unit.source: [End user guidance for Windows devices](../enduser/using-your-windows-device-with-intune.md)
trans-unit.target: [End user guidance for Windows devices](../enduser/using-your-windows-device-with-intune.md)

trans-unit.source: No additional work is required unless you will deploy the Company Portal to devices.
trans-unit.target: No additional work is required unless you will deploy the Company Portal to devices.

trans-unit.source: Steps 2 and 3 in the admin console can be safely ignored.
trans-unit.target: Steps 2 and 3 in the admin console can be safely ignored.
